channel.title: CVE Feed for Franklin Fueling System -- EVO 550
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Franklin Fueling System -- EVO 550

item.title: CVE-2024-2442|2024-03-19T16:28:24.518Z -- Franklin Fueling System -- EVO 550
item.description: Franklin Fueling System EVO 550 and EVO 5000 are vulnerable to a Path Traversal vulnerability that could allow an attacker to access sensitive files on the system.
